name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Principal Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **cloud-native systems** and **scalable architectures** in both healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in designing and deploying **microservices** and **cloud-based solutions** on **AWS** and **Azure**. Extensive experience in **cloud migration** and creating **fault-tolerant architectures** while applying **system design patterns** for optimal performance. Adept in implementing **CI/CD** processes and integrating **observability** and **DevOps** practices to enhance operational efficiencies.

Skilled in **Java**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and **Python**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated capability in constructing AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and real-time processing. Strong background in MLOps, proficient in model training and orchestration utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to fostering a culture of **mentorship** and **leadership** while leveraging strong **communication** and **analytical skills**.
